purpose: Micronutrient spec for target generation, actual intake aggregation, status evaluation, and UI messaging.

magnesium.ul_note: UL applies only to supplemental magnesium.

folate.ul_note: UL applies to synthetic folic acid only.

omega_3.note: No official DRI target exists for EPA+DHA specifically.

notes: Age defaults to 25 when missing in helper path.
Pregnancy/lactation logic only applies when sex=FEMALE.

rules_in_order: PENDING when actual missing or goal invalid

known_gotchas.issue: Some foods contain %DV-only label data without amount; values can be treated as null.
known_gotchas.recommended_fix: Either convert %DV to amount via FDA DV constants or explicitly mark as uncounted in quality metadata.

display_rules: KNOWN when all contributing foods have numeric micro values.
PARTIAL when at least one contributing food is missing a value.
UNKNOWN when no contributing foods have values.

phase_1.reason: Iodized salt is already in default foods and pregnancy/lactation relevance is high.
Common insufficiency marker in real-world diets.
Frequently expected in comprehensive micronutrient views.

baseline_food_ids_with_micro_data.name: Birds Eye Frozen Mixed Vegetables (Corn, Carrots, Green Beans, Peas)

heavy_sweat_toggle.note: Keep DRI as baseline; optional modifier can tune sports-context recommendations.

omega_3: target basis must match aggregated field omega3_epa_dha_mg

omega_3.note: Display intake only; no DRI goal percent or UL comparison.
